name: Death of the spirit
description:
The idea was that by completing levels you would obtain a spirit fragment and when you had all the fragments, you could revive yourself, but it's the first game jam I partecipate to and I started programming like a month ago...

The worst thing I did is that I didn't manage my time well, so I arrived to the last day that I didn't do much.

It is also really buggy... I'm really sorry
And it doesn't work... a total failure

Github code: https://github.com/maooam27/GameJamDeathBeginning.git
